column4: is there a place where i could get all the screens that pop up during the ubuntu install?
hey guys, is there another distro that is similar to ubuntu?
i cant seem to get ubuntu to install on my laptop so i have to find another distro :(
ubuntu's laptop support is top-notch
when i go to install, on the select keyboard screen it keeps scrolling like the screen is messed up
did you check the md5sum of the install image before burning it to CD?
well no, but i burned multiple copies of ubuntu live/install kubuntu live/install and none worked. but they did work on my desktop
I see.  Which laptop?  Did you try any kernel parameters?
inspiron 6000 and no
i did get the live cd to boot by pressing enter a bunch of times without reading the text
what make/model of laptop?
dell Inspiron 6000
u need the specs?
that should be working with the install CD
i know, its listed as compatable
i believe it will work once installed, but i cant install it because i cant read the text during the install because of the scrolling
check here for any info: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LaptopTestingTeam/DellInspiron6000-2
could i hook up an external monitor to it? would that work?
you can try that
is your laptop similar to the one in that URL?
yes it is
external monitor didnt pick up btw
sorry.   Good luck.  I need to get going.
